00005 #ifndef LUABIND_DETAIL_MAKE_INSTANCE_090310_HPP
00006 # define LUABIND_DETAIL_MAKE_INSTANCE_090310_HPP
00007 
00008 # include <boost/type_traits/is_polymorphic.hpp>
00009 # include <luabind/detail/inheritance.hpp>
00010 # include <luabind/detail/object_rep.hpp>
00011 
00012 namespace luabind { namespace detail {
00013 
00014 template <class T>
00015 std::pair<class_id, void*> get_dynamic_class_aux(
00016     lua_State* L, T const* p, mpl::true_)
00017 {
00018     lua_pushliteral(L, "__luabind_class_id_map");
00019     lua_rawget(L, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX);
00020 
00021     class_id_map& class_ids = *static_cast<class_id_map*>(
00022         lua_touserdata(L, -1));
00023 
00024     lua_pop(L, 1);
00025 
00026     return std::make_pair(
00027         class_ids.get_local(typeid(*p))
00028       , dynamic_cast<void*>(const_cast<T*>(p))
00029     );
00030 }
00031 
00032 template <class T>
00033 std::pair<class_id, void*> get_dynamic_class_aux(
00034     lua_State*, T const* p, mpl::false_)
00035 {
00036     return std::make_pair(registered_class<T>::id, (void*)p);
00037 }
00038 
00039 template <class T>
00040 std::pair<class_id, void*> get_dynamic_class(lua_State* L, T* p)
00041 {
00042     return get_dynamic_class_aux(L, p, boost::is_polymorphic<T>());
00043 }
00044 
00045 template <class T>
00046 class_rep* get_pointee_class(class_map const& classes, T*)
00047 {
00048     return classes.get(registered_class<T>::id);
00049 }
00050 
00051 template <class P>
00052 class_rep* get_pointee_class(lua_State* L, P const& p, class_id dynamic_id)
00053 {
00054     lua_pushliteral(L, "__luabind_class_map");
00055     lua_rawget(L, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX);
00056 
00057     class_map const& classes = *static_cast<class_map*>(
00058         lua_touserdata(L, -1));
00059 
00060     lua_pop(L, 1);
00061 
00062     class_rep* cls = classes.get(dynamic_id);
00063 
00064     if (!cls)
00065         cls = get_pointee_class(classes, get_pointer(p));
00066 
00067     return cls;
00068 }
00069 
00070 // Create an appropriate instance holder for the given pointer like object.
00071 template <class P>
00072 void make_instance(lua_State* L, P p)
00073 {
00074     std::pair<class_id, void*> dynamic = get_dynamic_class(L, get_pointer(p));
00075 
00076     class_rep* cls = get_pointee_class(L, p, dynamic.first);
00077 
00078     if (!cls)
00079     {
00080         throw std::runtime_error("Trying to use unregistered class");
00081     }
00082 
00083     object_rep* instance = push_new_instance(L, cls);
00084 
00085     typedef pointer_holder<P> holder_type;
00086 
00087     void* storage = instance->allocate(sizeof(holder_type));
00088 
00089     try
00090     {
00091         new (storage) holder_type(p, dynamic.first, dynamic.second, cls);
00092     }
00093     catch (...)
00094     {
00095         instance->deallocate(storage);
00096         lua_pop(L, 1);
00097         throw;
00098     }
00099 
00100     instance->set_instance(static_cast<holder_type*>(storage));
00101 }
00102 
00103 }} // namespace luabind::detail
00104 
00105 #endif // LUABIND_DETAIL_MAKE_INSTANCE_090310_HPP
